thread.title: Patterson wants Boykin to get down when running, says QB has 'too many flips'
thread.title_full: Patterson wants Boykin to get down when running, says QB has 'too many flips' | Dallas Morning News

author: Eddie Sefko
title: Patterson wants Boykin to get down when running, says QB has 'too many flips'
text:
FORT WORTH -- Gary Patterson has a request of his Heisman Trophy-candidate quarterback Trevone Boykin.
Enough with the acrobatic leaps to get extra yardage, OK?
"To be honest with you, he needs to get down -- too many flips," Patterson said. "When you get X amount [of yards], you need to get down. He didn't do much on Sunday. He was pretty beat up. Not anything significant, but enough that he needed to soak in the tub."
Boykin had an athletic move at the end of a touchdown run against SMU, paying the price with a tough hit.
"There are times when you got to do it," Patterson said. "But if you're at the 40-yard line, get the first down and get down. He's just got to be smart about all that stuff."
